scripts.build: react-scripts build && cra-append-sw -s ./src/custom-sw.js && npm run play-finish-sound
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run clean-map && cd build && surge -d https://bigtime.surge.sh && npm run play-finish-sound
scripts.deploy-q: npm run build && npm run clean-map && cd build && surge -d https://qbigtime.surge.sh && npm run play-finish-sound
scripts.deploy-sm: npm run build && cd build && surge -d https://qbigtime.surge.sh && npm run play-finish-sound
